entry.tran: 女权主义;女权运动;男女平等主义
entry.def: Feminism is the belief and aim that women should have the same rights, power, and opportunities as men.

example.ex: Feminism may have liberated the feminists, but it has still to change the lives of the majority of women.
example.tran: 女性运动也许解放了女权主义者，但尚未改变大多数女性的生活。
